mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Macquillen, Ephraim Cuthbert
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sent Jefferson copy of a pamphlet addressed to people of the U.S.; wants him to lay it before Congress. Enclosure: Petition to people of the U.S. asking redress from country which has injured him greatly, and arguing that the government is not protecting its people's freedoms and rights.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1808 September 12, Phila[delphi]a, [Pennsylvania] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
